data.message: Will i ever get a respond to my technical issue? What are you people, working over there? Ghosts? Don't you know anything about customer service? I have a technical issue!! I am not bothering you for instructions!

replies.message: Hi Spyros. We're sorry you're experiencing an issue. How can we help you? -Elissa

My public username was set from the beginning as  facebook.com/spyros.mastoras
While browsing in the settings section, i erased by mistake my username 
from the field you provide to us for username change. I didn't set 
another one, because i had no intention to change it. It happened by 
mistake. After that my username is not available to me. Can you please 
set it back as it was? All my friends are used to this username in order
 to search for me!
Since your system does not take in consideration fullstops, i want it back written as spyrosmastoras, one word like my email address spyrosmastoras@facebook.com
